title: qbic-pipelines/variantconsensus pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

patient.errorMessage: Patient name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

variantcaller.errorMessage: Variant caller name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

vcf.errorMessage: VCF file needs to be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf.gz'

vcf_tbi.errorMessage: Index file needs to be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf.gz.tbi'

varianttype.errorMessage: Varianttype can be provided and cannot contain spaces [either 'snps' or 'indels']
